QuestData.Title: Deep Roots
QuestData.Description: On a somewhat unrelated note, I've been putting together a collection of troll stories and legends for a... personal project. I was just thinking you might be able to help me find some of them.$b$bThe Bloodscalps at the Bal'lal ruins, on the coast to the southwest, maintain a large tablet documenting some of their stories. Of course, I'll reimburse you if you're able to bring any of these stories back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Bloodscalp Lore Tablet from the Bal'lal Ruins in Northern Stranglethorn.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you make it down to Bal'lal Ruins yet? Did you find the tablet?
QuestData.RewardText: To be honest, I'm sending this information home to Stormwind, for my wife and son. They love to hear about what I've been doing out here in the jungle, and I only get to visit so often. Every little bit helps.$b$bThank you, $n.
